response.overview: Lucio, a demon from another realm has arrived on earth to claim a superior warrior to lead his armies. If a warrior does not sacrifice themselves voluntarily, he threatens to level cities. Excelsia volunteers figuring she can overpower Lucio. She's powerful... even powerful enough to claim the advantage as they fight. Lucio has counted on her power and as soon as she begins to gain the upper hand, he hits a trigger setting off bombs in various cities. Excelsia realizes her position and immediately surrenders, putting the lives of citizens before her own. It's not enough for her to surrender. Lucio wants her loyalty. In front of a live stream broadcast worldwide, Lucio demands she renounce her status as a heroine and accept her new master. Fearing more lives will be lost, she gives in. Moments later, she finds herself face to face with Lucio again in another realm. He's brought her to his world, a world where he claims all the power.
response.title: Hell
